Class SolverThreadWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • SolverThreadWrapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class SolverThreadWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    A wrapper class for solvers so that multiple sovlers can be used at once and that the GUI can be updated concurrently.
    Since:
    2019-02-25
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Bradley Read
